devdoc.details: this is an experimental implementation. Might not be suitable for production use-cases

AuctionDoesNotExistOrHasEnded().details: used with revert when a wrong auction id is provided

AuctionEnded().details: used when trying to move to next phase

NotABeneficiary().details: used with revert when a non-beneficiary of an auction is trying to claim the auction's bid

PhaseEnded(uint8).details: used with revert when trying to perform an action which can only be perform during a phase that has already ended

PhaseNotStarted(uint8).details: used with revert when trying to perform an action  which can only be performed during a phase that hasn't started

AuctionRegistration(bytes32).details: emits when a new auction is registered

NewBid(address).details: emits when a new bid is placed

Withdrawal(address,uint256).details: emits when previous highest bidders withdraw their deposit returns

params.auctionId: id of the auction to place bid for

returns._0: array of auctions registered by `msg.sender` Note: The function returns an array whose length equals the length of `_auctionIds`.  Each element is actually an {Auction} struct with solidity default values except the  elements at the position whose Auction was created by the beneficiary

_depositReturns.details: save prev highestBidders whose funds are still left to be returned

devdoc.title: Blind auction contract

endAuction(bytes32).notice: end auction and return highest bidder's amount to beneficiary

userdoc.notice: Enables beneficiaries to place blind auctions and bidders to bid on whatever was auctioned
